General.Name: Rossi Residencial S.A
General.Description: Rossi Residencial S.A., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the construction, development, and sale of residential, commercial, hotel, and mixed properties in Brazil. The company is involved in the land subdivision activities; and provision of civil engineering services. Rossi Residencial S.A. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in São Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: Birmann 12 Building, Office 301, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 04717-004
